page.title: Check Point VPN-1 Edge W ADSL

revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:

|brand = Check Point |model = VPN-1 Edge |submodelappend = yes |submodel = W ADSL |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = SBXW-166LHGE-5 |wlclass = G54 |series = Edge |type = security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = P6XSBX-11GWLAN-5 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 8BF0880JB6900E |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN210; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS32 |cpu1_type_rev = 4Km |cpu1spd = 166 <!-- 166 / 200MHz --> |cpu2chip1 = Conexant;GS8120; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,X86, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU2 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = <!-- CPU2 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F5608U0D-PCB0; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Atmel;AT45DB161D; |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V561620FTP-H; |ram1_num = 2 |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 8 |ram2chip = SK hynix;HY57V641620ETP-6; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = IC+;IP175C; |dsl_ports = 1 |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:08:DA |oui = 00:08:DA
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, (57600 8N1),, J3 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL, RTC w/ battery, heatsink, metal case |addchip = CMOS Real Time Clock;Philips;PCF8563;;1;,,, ADSL Transceiver;Ikanos;BAZ-3882-NCAZ;;1;,,, 4-ports USB 2.0 Host Controller;VIA;VT6212L;;1;,,, 3.3V EconoReset;Dallas Semiconductor;DS1233A;;1;,,, Hex Inverter;Phillips Semiconductors;74LVC04AD;;1;,,, Octal Transparent D-Type Latch;TI;SN74LVC373A;;1;,,, Quadruple Bilateral Analog Switch;TI;SN74LV4066A;;2;,,, Quad 2-Input OR Gate;Philips Semiconductors;74HC32D;;1;,,, 512K CMOS Boot Sector Flash Memory;Spansion;S29AL004D;;1;,,, RS-232 Line Drivers and Receivers;Intersil (Renesas);ICL3243ECAZ;;1;,,, Positive-Edge Trigger Octal D-type Flip-Flop w/Reset;Philips Semiconductor;74LVC273;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.10.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = g u e [ ] s t h i s |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/25/2006 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Cameo WLG-1302 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR2414A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN210 [[MIPS32]] 4Km (@166MHz) *Memory: 64MB (SDRAM) *Storage: 512KB Boot Flash, 32MB NAND Flash *WiFi: [[Atheros]] AR2414A (802.11bg) *Network: 5x Fast Ethernet, 1x ADSL *USB: 2x USB 2.0 (Type A) ports
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Check Point VPN-1 Edge W ADSL Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:Check Point VPN-1 Edge W ADSL Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:Check Point VPN-1 Edge W ADSL Suboard Top.jpeg|ADSL Board Top File:Check Point VPN-1 Edge W ADSL Suboard Bottom.jpeg|ADSL Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
